name: Fat Mosquito
description:
CONTROLS:

Use W,A,D or Arrow Keys :)

P.S Pro Tip: Try to hit 5ml to become FAT

Hi friends! 

This is basically the first time I am using itch, git, making a game, doing pixel art, making music, participating in a game jam......so a whole lot of firsts. 

I hope you enjoy this very simple project I made this last month! It was extremely fun and I got to learn a lot! 

Feedback regarding any aspect of the game are welcome! Thank you in advance for taking some time to give me a feedback!
